thread.section_title: Hotel Aiglon - Esprit de France - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fantastic staff, great location
thread.title_full: Fantastic staff, great location - Review of Hotel Aiglon - Esprit de France, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Wesley B
title: Fantastic staff, great location
text: Enjoyed our stay, the hotel is just a few steps away from the Raspail metro station which was very convenient for sight seeing. Lots of nice eateries in the local area of the hotel. Hotel was nice, very clean and modern, the staff were fantastic and so helpful I cannot fault them in anyway. Overall a great stay and I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
